QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.allocation as allocation, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.code as code, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.from_date as from_date, odf_parent_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.invoice_rate as invoice_rate, odf_parent_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.total_hours as total_hours, (select created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) created where created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.created_by) as created_by, odf_parent_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.to_date as to_date, ((odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.total_hours*1)*(odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.invoice_rate*1)) as total_amount, (select created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) created where created.user_id = odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.name as name, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.odf_parent_id as odf_parent_id, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.invoice_resource as invoice_resource, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.odf_cncrt_parent_id as odf_cncrt_parent_id, odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.invoice_status as invoice_status, odf_parent_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts odf_ca_clr_vendor_contracts where 1 = 1 ) odf_parent_id where 1 = 1 and odf_ca_clr_vendor_invoice.odf_parent_id = odf_parent_id.odf_pk
